  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/933</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/933</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Els conreus escolars</string>
            <string language="en">School crops</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schulegetreide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Collectes d'école</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Colheitas da escola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I raccolti della scuola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχολικές συγκομιδές</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Projecte escolar sobre el compostatge de la fracció orgànica dels residus generats en l'àmbit familiar i la posterior utilització del compost, en el conreu de plantes, a l'hivernacle de l'escola. Conté explicacions, fotografies i vídeos. 2n premi (infantil i primària) del 6è concurs de webs de ciència.</string>
            <string language="en">School project on composting the organic portion of household waste and using it for growing plants in the school greenhouse. Explanations, photos and videos are included. Second prize (nursery and primary schools) in the 6th science webpage competition.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">agricultura</string>
            <string language="en">agriculture</string>
            <string language="es">agricultura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ecologia</string>
            <string language="en">ecology</string>
            <string language="es">ecología</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schuleprojekt auf dem Düngen des organischen 
Teils des Haushalts überschüssig und dem Verwenden er für wachsende
Betriebe im Schulegewächshaus. Erklärungen, Fotos und videos 
sind enthalten. Zweiter Preis (Baumschule und Primärschulen) in
der 6. Wissenschaft Webseite Konkurrenz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projet d'école sur composter la partie organique
du ménage de rebut et l'utiliser pour les usines croissantes en serre
chaude d'école. Les explications, les photos et les videos sont
inclus. Deuxième prix (pépinière et écoles primaires) en 
6ème concurrence de page Web de la science.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projeto da escola em composting a parcela 
orgânica da casa waste e em usá-la para plantas crescentes na estufa
da escola. As explanações, as fotos e os videos são 
incluídos. Segundo prêmio (berçário e escolas preliminares) 
na ã competição do Web page da ciência.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progetto della scuola sul concimare con la 
composta la parte organica della famiglia residua e sul usando per le 
piante crescenti nella serra della scuola. Le spiegazioni, le 
foto ed i videos sono inclusi. Secondo premio (scuola materna e 
scuole primarie) nella sesta concorrenza di Web page di scienza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχολικό πρόγραμμα για τη λιπασματοποίηση της οργανικής
μερίδας των οικιακών αποβλήτων και τη χρησιμοποίηση τους για την 
ανάπτυξη των εγκαταστάσεων στο σχολικό θερμοκήπιο. Οι 
εξηγήσεις, οι φωτογραφίες και τα βίντεο συμπεριλαμβάνονται. 
Δεύτερο βραβείο (βρεφικός σταθμός και σχολεία πρωτοβάθμιας
εκπαίδευσης) στον 6ο ανταγωνισμό webpage επιστήμης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Landwirtschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ökologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">agriculture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">agricultura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ecology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">agricoltura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ecologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωργία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οικολογία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
